headline.main: F.D.A. Panel Backs New Diet Pill

docs.abstract: Contrave could be the first new drug approved to combat obesity in more than a decade. But a panel still said it was concerned about some health risks.
docs.snippet: Contrave could be the first new drug approved to combat obesity in more than a decade. But a panel still said it was concerned about some health risks.

headline.main: The Week Ahead in Drug Industry News

docs.abstract: An F.D.A. panel reviews an experimental anti-obesity drug.
docs.lead_paragraph: Speculation about the real reasons behind the unexpected resignation Sunday of Pfizer's chief executive and chairman, Jeffrey B. Kindler, is sure to fuel water-cooler conversations across the drug industry this week.
docs.snippet: An F.D.A. panel reviews an experimental anti-obesity drug.

headline.seo: F.D.A. Panel Votes to Expand Surgery for Less Obese
headline.print_headline: Panel Votes to Expand Surgery for Less Obese
headline.main: Panel Votes to Expand Surgery for Less Obese

docs.lead_paragraph: Current guidelines say weight-loss surgery is appropriate for people who have failed to lose weight through diet and exercise and have a body mass index of 40 and above.
docs.snippet: Current guidelines say weight-loss surgery is appropriate for people who have failed to lose weight through diet and exercise and have a body mass index of 40 and above.

headline.main: F.D.A. Panel Backs Expansion of Obesity Surgery

docs.abstract: The maker of the Lap-Band, a stomach-restricting device, estimated that 27 million Americans would be eligible under standards for those who are not severely obese.
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal advisory panel on Friday endorsed an expansion of the use of Allergan's Lap-Band stomach restricting device to patients who are less than severely obese.
docs.snippet: The maker of the Lap-Band, a stomach-restricting device, estimated that 27 million Americans would be eligible under standards for those who are not severely obese.

headline.print_headline: Congress Sends Child Nutrition Bill Championed by Mrs. Obama to President to Sign

docs.lead_paragraph: The bill expands the school lunch program and sets new standards to improve the quality of school meals.
docs.snippet: The bill expands the school lunch program and sets new standards to improve the quality of school meals.

headline.seo: F.D.A. Studies Band Surgery for Less Obese
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Studies Band Surgery For Less Obese
headline.main: Obesity Surgery May Become Option for Many More

docs.lead_paragraph: Food and Drug Administration advisers will consider a request by a pharmaceutical company to lower how obese someone must be to qualify for surgery using its device.
docs.snippet: Food and Drug Administration advisers will consider a request by a pharmaceutical company to lower how obese someone must be to qualify for surgery using its device.
